Title: NumericUpDown Control for WPF
Description: A basic NumericUpDown Control for WPF that mirrors all the most used functions of the WinForms NumericUpDown Control and looks similar to it
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A basic NumericUpDown Control for WPF that mirrors all the most used functions of the WinForms NumericUpDown Control and looks similar to it

The control is built with Visual Stuido 2010, the Binaries require .NET 4.0

If you like this library, please think about making a donation:
